description: Get details of network/routing instances/vrfs from a network device using NAPALM.
name: get_network_instances

credentials.description: The credentials group which contains the username and password to log in

driver.description: Device driver name for connecting to device, see https://napalm.readthedocs.io/en/latest/support/index.html for list.

hostname.description: The hostname of the device to connect to. Driver must be specified if hostname is not in configuration. Hostname without FQDN can be given if device is in configuration.

htmlout.description: In addition to the normal output also includes html output.

name.description: Get details about a specific routing/network instance
